text: Enywe abasuubila, mube abokhwemelela obwatoto, abarusia obuloli shichila Nyasaye, kata nikali mbu nikhwinywe abeene, nohomba khubebusi benyu nohomba abekho benyu. Nenali omuyinda nohomba omumanani Nyasaye niye okhoyeshela muno hakari wabu , kho mulaloonda obwikombi mwalekha okhukhola obulengâ€™aafu tawe. Ne nimukorombania obuloli nohomba mwakhaya okhurusia obuloli Nyasaye yetsa okhubasandia, Ne Nyasaye amanyile kalia koosi kamukholanga
